column4: so i'm currently on vista, but thinking of making the switch this summer
i've got 3GB of RAM, should i use 32 or 64 bit ubuntu?
Probably 32 bit will give you less headaches at this time
32bit works on both 32 or 64 bit cpus but only sees normally about 3.2Gb of ram. 64 bit only runs on 64 bit cpus and sees all your ram. Most apps run in 32 bit
